Text: Re Associates PRC Year end ReviewThe PRC process closed last week You should have received information regarding representing your associatesanalysts at a meeting to be held on the th of this month If not you should check with the AssociateAnalysts or HR for this information After the preranking meeting then you should submit the ranking and your evaluation to Mark for the final Corporate ranking Thanks Wilma J Williams Enron Broadband Services Corporate Development PH EB Rod NRON AM To Wilma WilliamsEnron NRON COMMUNICATIONS cc Subject Re Associates PRC Year end Review When is the PRC Wilma NRON COMMUNICATIONS PM To Bryan KiteEnron nron Communications Brian SpectorEnron nron Communications Kal CT Richard ES Edward D CT Kim GodfreyEnron nron Communications Scott CT Rod nron Frank BayEnron nron Communications cc Subject Associates PRC Year end Review Dear Managers Mark J Russ has been selected for the yearend review to represent an associates under your management In order to do this effectively it is important that he receive your feedback and ranking as soon as possible If you have any questions please feel free to call Mark at or myself at Thank you in advance for your help Wilma J Williams Enron Broadband Services Corporate Development PH EB

Supervisors PEP Evaluation Reportall Mark Russ is representing one or more associate under your supervision We need as soon as possible your prepared feedback and evaluation on each associate you supervise You may email or send via interoffice mail this information to either Mark or myself Thanks for your prompt attention to this important matter Wilma J Williams Enron Broadband Services Corporate Development PH EB

Performance EvaluationsRatings on Associatesall This is just a reminder that we need PEP forms and ratings on those associates under your charge that will be represented by Mark Russ Wednesday December is the day that the Associates will be evaluated and rated on a Corporate level We would encourage you to submit this information to either Mark Russ or myself by Friday December th Brad Richter Mo Bawa Billy Braddock John Choi Richard Leibert Mark Dypiangco Rod Hayslett Michael Ratner Sheila Kahanek Nikhil Shah Thank you for your prompt attention to this very important matter Wilma J Williams Enron Broadband Services Corporate Development PH EB

Our Wonderful CompanyDear Mr Lay I know that you are a very busy man and really dont have time to read messages from your employees but I just had to write you of my thought and feelings I havent been sleeping very well because I am heartbroken at what is happening to this wonderful company I really try to be positive about the outcome of it all but the news seem to get worse and worse I am so worried about all of the lives that are being affected and what its going to mean to all of us in the coming months Also as someone who only has a few years left before retirement I am faced with the possibility that I will not have any supplemental retirement to help me live in a decent environment I love Enron and all that it has made it great and will continue to work hard to make a contribution to its success However I realize that it ultimately is up to you and your team to successfully resolve all the issues facing our company I have the faith that you can do that Mr Lay please allow me to be bold and ask you to remember that God is Always in Control and he will help if only we ask him to Thank you so much for your time Wilma J Williams Sr Admin Asst EAS and EWS Financial Reporting EB B Ext
